ThingDef.label: imperial escort ship, bottom
ThingDef.description: Imperial escort ships are designed and operated as escorts for convoys of merchant ships and other naval vessels. Even the biggest escort ships are designed for intra-system travel, and are completely incapable of interstellar travel, most of them even lacking cryptosleep facilities.
